trans-unit.source: Displays a dialog for editing multi-line strings in design mode.
trans-unit.target: 顯示對話方塊，編輯 設計模式中的多行字串。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.MultilineStringEditor"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.MultilineStringEditor"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Edits the specified object value using the edit style provided by <xref:System.Drawing.Design.ImageEditor.GetEditStyle*>.
trans-unit.target: 編輯指定的物件的值使用<xref:System.Drawing.Design.ImageEditor.GetEditStyle*>.</xref:System.Drawing.Design.ImageEditor.GetEditStyle*>所提供的編輯樣式

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> that can be used to gain additional context information.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"> </xref> ，可用來取得額外的內容資訊。

trans-unit.source: A service provider object through which editing services can be obtained.
trans-unit.target: 透過編輯服務可以取得服務提供者物件。

trans-unit.source: An instance of the value being edited.
trans-unit.target: 正在編輯的值執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The new value of the object.
If the value of the object has not changed, this method should return the same object passed to it.
trans-unit.target: 如果物件的值未經變更，則這個方法應該傳回相同的物件傳遞給它。

trans-unit.source: Gets the editing style of the <xref:System.Drawing.Design.ImageEditor.EditValue*> method.
An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> that can be used to gain additional context information.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"> </xref> ，可用來取得額外的內容資訊。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditorEditStyle"></xref> enumeration value indicating the supported editing style.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditorEditStyle"> </xref>列舉值，指出支援的編輯樣式。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether this editor supports painting a representation of an object's value.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出這個編輯器是否支援繪製物件值的表示。

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> that can be used to gain additional context information.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"> </xref> ，可用來取得額外的內容資訊。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>, indicating that this <xref href="System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor"></xref> does not display a visual representation in the Properties Window.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>指出這個<xref href="System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor"></xref>不會在 [屬性] 視窗中顯示的視覺表示法。
